alert.note: Alert for Eastern Chichagof Island; Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued April 05 at 5:31AM AKDT until April 07 at 12:00PM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Southeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Portions of the central Inner Channels including Juneau and Tenakee Springs. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Aviation and marine transportation could be impacted. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...With increasing confidence in the track of a powerful storm, gusty winds are certain for the northern Panhandle. However, how strong gusts become is still uncertain. The time period when the highest gusts will occur is from midnight Wednesday night through 6 AM. However, should the storm slow its progress northward, the threat could persist into Thursday morning.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Chichagof Island; Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island
